text: "Demons" is a 2001 song by Fatboy Slim featuring Macy Gray. It is the second single from his third studio album Halfway Between the Gutter and the Stars. It went to number 16 in both the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 78 in Australia and number 41 in Italy. == Track listing == ; UK 12" # "Demons" (featuring Macy Gray) # "The Pimp" # "Camber Sands" == References == Category:2001 songs Category:Fatboy Slim songs Category:Macy Gray songs
title: Demons (Fatboy Slim song)
